content.description: This is a remote monolith of immaculate granite found in the middle of the woods. To date it has about 10 routes on it that are all trad and mostly crack climbing. Developed entirely by Rio Rose and Dave Jacobsen, it has worthwhile climbing from 5.2 to 5.12. A really cool wall that has a day's worth of stuff and a guarantee that you'll have the place to yourself.
